Title: 8th International Symposium on Climate Resilience and Adaptation Strategies
Content: Focusing on innovative strategies for climate adaptation across vulnerable ecosystems and urban environments. Discussing policy frameworks, community-based initiatives, and technological solutions for enhancing resilience.

Title: 4th National Workshop on Advanced Materials Synthesis
Content: A workshop targeting researchers and students in materials science, covering novel synthesis techniques for nanomaterials, polymers, and composites, with applications in energy and catalysis.

Title: InnovateHealth 2025: AI in Diagnostics and Personalized Medicine
Content: Exploring the latest advancements in artificial intelligence for medical image analysis, disease prediction, drug discovery, and tailoring treatments to individual patient profiles. Includes ethical considerations.

Title: Regional Forum on Sustainable Water Management in Arid Regions
Content: Addressing challenges of water scarcity, reuse technologies, desalination advancements, and policy coordination for sustainable water resource management in North Africa and the Middle East.

Title: 5th International Conference on Theoretical Physics: Quantum Fields and Gravity
Content: A gathering of theoretical physicists presenting cutting-edge research in quantum field theory, string theory, quantum gravity, and cosmology. Includes plenary talks and parallel sessions.

Title: National Seminar on Algerian Economic Diversification Strategies
Content: Analyzing pathways for diversifying the Algerian economy beyond hydrocarbons, focusing on sectors like renewable energy, tourism, agriculture, and digital economy. Policy recommendations discussed.

Title: Future Compute: Quantum Computing Applications Workshop
Content: Exploring potential applications of quantum computing in fields like materials science, drug discovery, cryptography, and optimization. Features talks from academic and industry leaders.

Title: Pan-African Summit on Education Quality and Access
Content: High-level summit addressing challenges and strategies for improving the quality of and access to primary, secondary, and higher education across the African continent. Focus on policy, funding, and innovation.

Title: 12th Annual Symposium on Medieval History: Trade and Cultural Exchange
Content: Examining patterns of trade, migration, and cultural interactions across Europe, the Mediterranean, and Asia during the medieval period. Includes new archaeological and textual evidence.

Title: Workshop on Communicable Disease Surveillance and Response
Content: Training workshop for public health professionals on modern techniques for disease surveillance, outbreak investigation, data analysis, and effective public health response coordination.

Title: Robotics Futures Conference 2025
Content: Showcasing the latest research in robotics, including autonomous systems, human-robot interaction, manipulation, locomotion, and AI integration in robotic applications.

Title: Algerian National Conference on Civil Engineering and Infrastructure Durability
Content: Focusing on sustainable construction materials, structural health monitoring, earthquake engineering, and maintenance strategies for ensuring the longevity of Algerian infrastructure.

Title: Global Forum on Financial Inclusion and Digital Payments
Content: Discussing strategies and innovations to expand access to financial services for underserved populations globally, leveraging digital technologies, fintech solutions, and regulatory frameworks.

Title: 7th Asian Conference on Biotechnology and Bioengineering
Content: Covering recent advances in genetic engineering, bioprocess technology, synthetic biology, tissue engineering, and applications in medicine, agriculture, and environmental science.

Title: Maghreb Regional Seminar on Renewable Energy Integration Challenges
Content: Addressing technical and economic challenges related to integrating large-scale solar and wind power into the electricity grids of Maghreb countries. Focus on grid stability, storage, and policy.

Title: Space Tech Expo Europe 2025
Content: Europe's premier B2B event for space technology, showcasing the latest developments in spacecraft manufacturing, launch services, satellite technology, ground systems, and exploration.

Title: Global Summit on Human Rights and Migration
Content: Addressing the complex intersection of human rights law, international migration patterns, refugee protection, and challenges related to displacement and integration policies worldwide.

Title: West African Conference on Agricultural Innovation and Food Security
Content: Focusing on sustainable farming practices, climate-resilient crops, post-harvest technologies, market access for smallholders, and policy interventions to enhance food security in West Africa.

Title: 5th Algerian Symposium on Catalysis and Green Chemistry
Content: Presenting research on novel catalysts, environmentally friendly solvents, process intensification, and sustainable chemical processes relevant to Algerian industry and environmental protection.

Title: Leadership in a Changing World: Global Policy Forum 2025
Content: A forum bringing together global leaders, policymakers, and academics to discuss pressing international challenges including geopolitical shifts, economic instability, climate change, and technological disruption.

Org/Univ: Centre de Recherche Scientifique et Technique en Soudage et Contrôle (Algeria)
Title: National Workshop on Non-Destructive Testing Techniques
Content: Practical workshop covering advanced NDT methods like ultrasonic testing, radiographic testing, eddy current, and acoustic emission for quality control and structural integrity assessment in industry.

Title: Future Cities 2025: Sustainable Urban Development Conference
Content: Exploring innovations in smart city technologies, sustainable infrastructure, urban planning, green buildings, waste management, and transportation systems for resilient and livable cities.

Title: 3rd Mediterranean Conference on Marine Biology and Oceanography
Content: Covering biodiversity, ecosystem functioning, pollution impacts, climate change effects, fisheries management, and conservation strategies within the Mediterranean Sea.

Title: SIGGRAPH 2025: International Conference on Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques
Content: The premier conference for computer graphics research, showcasing advancements in rendering, animation, virtual reality, augmented reality, modeling, simulation, and human-computer interaction.

Title: National Forum on Saharan Agriculture Development: Challenges and Opportunities
Content: Discussing innovative techniques for agriculture in arid Saharan conditions, including water management, adapted crops, greenhouse technologies, and economic viability for local development.

Title: 2025 Annual Meetings of the IMF and World Bank Group
Content: Gatherings of central bankers, ministers of finance and development, private sector executives, civil society, and academics to discuss issues of global concern, including the world economic outlook, poverty eradication, economic development, and aid effectiveness.

Title: EuroScience Open Forum (ESOF) 2025
Content: A biennial, pan-European meeting dedicated to scientific research and innovation. Covers a wide range of scientific fields, science policy, and the relationship between science and society.

Title: 15th National Congress of Pediatrics
Content: Covering recent advances in pediatric medicine, including neonatology, infectious diseases, nutrition, vaccination updates, child development, and common pediatric conditions in Algeria.

Title: International Conference on Communications (ICC) 2025
Content: One of the flagship conferences of the IEEE Communications Society, covering all aspects of communications technology, including wireless, optical, satellite, networking, IoT, and 6G.

Title: African Studies Association Africa Hub Conference 2025
Content: A major conference focusing on multidisciplinary research concerning Africa, covering topics in history, politics, anthropology, literature, economics, and development studies.

Title: International Conference on Applied Mathematics and Computing (ICAMC'25)
Content: Focusing on recent developments in applied mathematics, numerical analysis, optimization, scientific computing, and their applications in engineering, finance, and biological sciences.

Title: 3rd Global Ministerial Summit on Patient Safety
Content: Bringing together health ministers, policymakers, and experts to accelerate action on patient safety globally, addressing issues like medication safety, diagnostic errors, and healthcare-associated infections.

Title: Neuroscience Futures Symposium 2025
Content: Highlighting cutting-edge research across neuroscience, from molecular mechanisms and systems neuroscience to cognitive function, neurological disorders, and computational modelling.

Title: Advanced Solar Technologies Conference 2025
Content: Focusing on breakthroughs in photovoltaic materials (perovskites, tandem cells), concentrated solar power, solar forecasting, grid integration, and manufacturing cost reduction.

Title: 4th Algerian Congress on Metallurgy and Materials Engineering
Content: Presenting research on ferrous and non-ferrous metallurgy, advanced alloys, materials processing, corrosion, welding, and characterization techniques relevant to Algerian industry.

Title: Summer School on Particle Physics
Content: An intensive school for PhD students and young researchers covering the standard model, beyond the standard model physics, neutrino physics, astroparticle physics, and collider phenomenology.

Title: APS Annual Convention 2025
Content: The premier international event for scientific psychology, featuring the latest research across all areas of psychology, including cognitive, social, developmental, clinical, and neuroscience.

Title: National Workshop on Earth Observation Applications for Agriculture
Content: Exploring the use of satellite imagery and remote sensing data for crop monitoring, yield estimation, drought assessment, and precision agriculture applications in Algeria.

Title: Global Hydrogen Summit 2025
Content: Focusing on the role of clean hydrogen in the energy transition, covering production technologies (green and blue hydrogen), infrastructure development, end-use applications, policy, and investment.

Org/Univ: University of Science and Technology Houari Boumediene (USTHB)
Title: 10th International Conference on Software Engineering and New Technologies (ICSENT'25)
Content: Covering diverse topics in software engineering including AI in SE, cloud computing, cybersecurity, big data, IoT, software architecture, testing, and formal methods.

Title: Clean Cooking Forum 2025
Content: Bringing together stakeholders to accelerate the transition to clean cooking solutions globally, addressing health, environmental, and economic impacts of traditional cooking methods.

Title: Cambridge Symposium on Language Diversity and Evolution
Content: Exploring the origins, evolution, and diversity of human languages from linguistic, anthropological, genetic, and cognitive perspectives. Includes discussions on language endangerment.

Title: 8th National Congress of Rheumatology
Content: Presenting updates on the diagnosis and management of rheumatic diseases, including rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, lupus, and spondyloarthropathies. Focus on new therapies.

Title: ICH Global Meeting on Pharmaceutical Regulation
Content: Meeting of global regulatory authorities and pharmaceutical industry representatives to discuss the development and implementation of harmonised guidelines for drug development and approval.

Title: National Seminar on Date Palm Cultivation and Valorization
Content: Focusing on advancements in date palm cultivation techniques, pest management (like Bayoud disease), genetic improvement, and the processing and marketing of date products.

Title: EMBL Conference: The Human Microbiome
Content: Exploring the latest research on the composition, function, and host interactions of the human microbiome in health and disease, utilizing genomics, metabolomics, and systems biology.

Title: AEA Annual Meeting 2026
Content: The largest annual gathering of economists, presenting papers across all fields of economics including macroeconomics, microeconomics, econometrics, finance, and economic policy.

Org/Univ: National Agency for Valorization of Research Results and Technological Development (ANVREDET)
Title: TechInnov Algeria 2025: Technology Transfer & Innovation Forum
Content: Connecting researchers, entrepreneurs, industry, and investors to promote the transfer of university research into commercial applications and foster technological innovation in Algeria.

Title: IAU Symposium 390: Galaxy Formation and Evolution
Content: Bringing together astronomers to discuss the latest observational data and theoretical models concerning how galaxies form and evolve over cosmic time, including the role of dark matter and feedback.

Title: 6th Algerian Conference on Signal Processing and Telecommunications (ACSPT'25)
Content: Covering topics in digital signal processing, image and video processing, speech recognition, wireless communications, network security, and antenna design.

Org/Univ: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
Title: COP 30 - UN Climate Change Conference
Content: The 30th Conference of the Parties, bringing together nations to negotiate and advance global efforts to combat climate change under the Paris Agreement framework.

Org/Univ: International Association for Hydro-Environment Engineering and Research (IAHR)
Title: 41st IAHR World Congress
Content: Covering a broad range of topics in hydraulics, water resources management, ecohydraulics, coastal engineering, climate change adaptation, and water informatics.

Title: National Seminar on Smart Grids and Renewable Energy Management
Content: Exploring technologies and strategies for modernizing Algeria's power grid, integrating renewable energy sources, demand-side management, and energy storage solutions.

Title: MLA Annual Convention 2026
Content: The largest gathering for scholars of languages and literature, featuring sessions on literary studies, linguistics, composition, cultural studies, and professional development.

Org/Univ: International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC)
Title: 50th IUPAC World Chemistry Congress
Content: A major international congress covering all fields of chemistry, including organic, inorganic, physical, analytical, polymer, materials, environmental, and medicinal chemistry.

Title: Workshop on Industrial Automation and Control Systems Security
Content: Focusing on cybersecurity threats to industrial control systems (ICS/SCADA), vulnerability assessment, security standards, and best practices for protecting critical infrastructure.

Title: WAC-10: Tenth World Archaeological Congress
Content: A global forum for archaeologists covering diverse themes such as heritage management, theoretical archaeology, indigenous archaeology, material culture studies, and new field methods.

Title: AfDB Annual Meetings 2025
Content: Bringing together governors (finance ministers/central bank governors) from member countries to discuss development issues in Africa, Bank operations, and policies.

Title: International Seminar on Traditional Architecture and Urbanism in the M'zab Valley
Content: Analyzing the unique architectural heritage and urban planning principles of the M'zab Valley (UNESCO World Heritage site), focusing on sustainability, conservation, and cultural significance.

Title: Neuroscience 2025
Content: The world's largest gathering of neuroscientists, presenting emerging science, learning opportunities, and professional development across all areas of brain research.

Org/Univ: International Society for Optics and Photonics (SPIE)
Title: SPIE Photonics West 2026
Content: The leading global event for the photonics and laser industries, covering biomedical optics, lasers, optoelectronics, microfabrication, MOEMS-MEMS, and displays.

Title: World Conference on Cultural Policies and Sustainable Development - MONDIACULT 2025
Content: A global forum for culture ministers and stakeholders to shape a renewed vision for cultural policies and their contribution to sustainable development worldwide.

Title: National Workshop on Geothermal Energy Potential in Algeria
Content: Assessing the geothermal resources in Algeria, exploring exploration techniques, potential applications (power generation, direct use), and regulatory aspects for development.

Title: ESA Annual Meeting 2025
Content: Bringing together ecologists to present research on various topics including biodiversity, climate change impacts, ecosystem services, conservation biology, and ecological theory.

Title: International Congress of Mathematicians (ICM) 2026
Content: The largest conference for the topic of mathematics. Held every four years, featuring plenary lectures, Fields Medal presentations, and sessions across all mathematical disciplines.

Org/Univ: Centre de Développement des Energies Renouvelables (CDER)
Title: Algerian Solar Energy Summit 2025
Content: Focusing on photovoltaic and thermal solar energy advancements, grid integration, policy support, manufacturing potential, and research & development activities in Algeria.

Title: ASME International Mechanical Engineering Congress & Exposition (IMECE) 2025
Content: ASME's largest research and development conference, covering diverse areas of mechanical engineering including advanced manufacturing, heat transfer, fluids engineering, design, and energy.

Org/Univ: International Union of Food Science and Technology (IUFoST)
Title: 23rd World Congress of Food Science and Technology
Content: Covering food safety, quality, processing, nutrition, chemistry, engineering, sustainability, and innovation in the global food sector.

Title: National Symposium on Berber Language, Literature, and Culture
Content: Exploring linguistic research, literary analysis, cultural heritage preservation, standardization efforts, and educational aspects related to the Berber (Tamazight) language in Algeria.

Title: ITU World Radiocommunication Conference 2027 (WRC-27)
Content: A treaty-level conference held every four years to review and revise the Radio Regulations, the international treaty governing the use of the radio-frequency spectrum and satellite orbits.

Title: CHER 37th Annual Conference
Content: Focusing on research into higher education systems, policies, governance, funding, quality assurance, internationalization, and the academic profession.

Title: Seminar on Antimicrobial Resistance Surveillance in Algeria
Content: Discussing current data on antimicrobial resistance patterns in Algeria, laboratory surveillance methods, infection control strategies, and national action plan progress.

Org/Univ: International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions (IFLA)
Title: IFLA World Library and Information Congress 2025
Content: The leading international event for the library and information services sector, covering topics like digital libraries, information literacy, open access, cultural heritage, and community engagement.

Title: 2025 AIChE Annual Meeting
Content: The premier educational forum for chemical engineers covering research and development, new technologies, emerging growth areas, and process safety.

Title: National Conference on Coastal Zone Management and Marine Environment Protection
Content: Addressing issues of coastal erosion, marine pollution, sustainable tourism, fisheries management, and integrated coastal zone planning specific to the Algerian coastline.

Title: 38th International Geological Congress (IGC)
Content: Held every four years, this is the premier global congress for geosciences, covering all fields including mineralogy, petrology, geochemistry, tectonics, paleontology, and applied geology.

Org/Univ: African Organization for Research and Training in Cancer (AORTIC)
Title: AORTIC International Conference on Cancer in Africa 2025
Content: Focusing on cancer prevention, diagnosis, treatment, research, and palliative care relevant to the African context. Includes epidemiology, clinical trials, and health systems strengthening.

Title: Workshop on Dam Safety and Monitoring Techniques
Content: Practical workshop covering instrumentation, data analysis, risk assessment, inspection methods, and emergency preparedness plans related to dam safety in Algeria.

Title: AAS Annual Conference 2026
Content: The largest North American conference dedicated to research on East, South, and Southeast Asia, covering history, politics, culture, literature, anthropology, and more.

Title: Quadrennial World Meteorological Congress (Cg-20)
Content: The supreme body of the WMO, meeting every four years to determine policies, approve long-term plans, adopt technical regulations, and elect officers.

Title: ISWA World Congress 2025
Content: Global meeting on sustainable waste management and resource efficiency, covering topics like circular economy, waste-to-energy, landfill management, recycling technologies, and policy.

Title: National Seminar on Olive Oil Production Technology and Quality
Content: Discussing advancements in olive cultivation, oil extraction processes, quality control methods, sensory analysis, health benefits, and marketing of Algerian olive oil.

Title: APSA Annual Meeting & Exhibition 2025
Content: The premier conference for political scientists, featuring research presentations across all subfields including comparative politics, international relations, political theory, and American politics.
